caption:
A mission that spanned 70 years, where brave people risked everything to map India’s vast and diverse lands.

From the peaks of Everest to the hidden valleys of Tibet, the Great Trigonometrical Survey forever transformed how the world sees India.

Swipe through to discover the incredible journey that shaped the very foundation of modern mapping!

#MappingIndia #IncredibleJourney #SurveyOfIndia #Exploration #IndianHistory
[William Lambton, Radhanath Sikdar, Nain Singh Rawat, India, India Map, Tibet, Mountains and Rivers, Journey]
